input_args.passage: "Review of Orkworld - RPGnet RPG Game Index | On one hand, it's a pretty simple die mechanic, almost identical to the Silhouette or Icon system (although Orkworld is straight die pool, you ... $25.00"
input_args.claim: 'From citation, we learn that Orkworld is a book where Wick opens his work with The Caius Journals — the diary of a young soldier serving in the armies of the Solarian Empire.'
